add(Book) - Method in class hac.ex4.beans.BasketList
Get a book and if doesn't exist add this book to the list, if it is existing already - increase quantity of this book by 1.

Implementation of GET request (see the POST that correspond).
addBookPOST(Book, BindingResult, Model) - Method in class hac.ex4.controllers.AdminController
Get a POST request with a book from a form and validate the book, if has constraints error, return the same page form with the error messages, if is valid book - save the book in the database.
